text: Marco Engelhardt (born 2 December 1980) is a German former professional footballer who played as a defensive midfielder. ==Club career== Engelhardt previously played for Karlsruher SC, 1. FC Nürnberg and 1. FC Kaiserslautern. On 3 March 2007, he played his first Bundesliga match for Nürnberg against Arminia Bielefeld. On 19 December 2008, he announced his return to Karlsruher SC, signing a contract until 30 June 2012. ==International career== Engelhardt has earned three caps for the Germany national football team. ==Post-playing career== After retiring as a player, Engelhardt works as a scout for Werder Bremen. ==Honours== ===Club=== 1\.
